name: aurora-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Fires a rainbow-colored beam that may lower ATTACK.
flavor_text.emerald: Fires a rainbow-colored beam that may lower ATTACK.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A rainbow-colored attack beam. It may lower the foe’s ATTACK stat.
